Helper.DraftMessage: This entry is a draft. You can help by editing the entry and adding the missing information.
Helper.EntryIsMissingInformation: This entry is missing the following information:
Helper.EntryValidationNoErrors: This entry contains all the required information.
Helper.EntryValidationNoErrorsDraft: This entry contains all the required information to be marked as finalized (not draft).
Helper.StatusDescriptionApproved: Approved entries have been inspected by a trusted user. Editing of approved entries is limited.
Helper.StatusDescriptionDraft: Draft entries are missing some required information.
Helper.StatusDescriptionFinished: Finished entries contain all the required information but haven't been approved yet.
Helper.StatusDescriptionLocked: Locked entries can only be edited by staff members.
